articles.description: The company is taking action to protect its staff and stop further damage to its stores
articles.content:
Apple has warned looters that it is tracking stolen devices as some of the firm's US stores are targeted by looters.
Apple has closed some shops in areas affected by riots over the death of George F… [+3074 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 might miss out on Galaxy S20's high-res zoom camera - TechRadar

articles.content:
